panels.title: Source Records Consumed Rate (records per sec)

panels.description:
Decision intensity over time.
1: Rescale Up
0: No Action
-1: Rescale Down
panels.title: Rescale Decision Heatmap

panels.description:
Heat map representing the distribution of Flink active jobs query duration. 

At each point in time, each cell was hit with an average rate of times, averaged across observation periods of 30 seconds.
panels.title: Flink query active jobs duration, event rate [1/s]
